casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. IRVING TRUST COMPANY, as Trustee In Bankruptcy of Delaware Cosmetics, Inc., Formerly Known as Marinello Company, a Delaware Corporation, Bankrupt, Appellant. No. 222. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. ’ Feb. 15, 1937. Krause, Hirsch & Levin, of New York City (Sydney Krause and Sidney Gross, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Lamar Plardy, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Richard Delafieldj Asst. U. S. Atty., and Robert L. Werner, Sp. Asst. U. S. Atty., both of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed on opinion below.*

No opinion for publication.
